text: The River Avon is a river in central England. It is a left tributary of the River Severn. It is long. The Avon flows through the counties of Northamptonshire, Leicestershire, Warwickshire, Worcestershire and Gloucestershire. Category:Rivers of Northamptonshire Category:Geography of Leicestershire Category:Rivers of Warwickshire Category:Rivers of Worcestershire Category:Rivers of Gloucestershire
title: River Avon, Warwickshire
